name: WFS Easy Website Demo
author: WebfaceScript

sections.description:
Features:

  • Creating a demo site in wordpress blog
  • Based on wordpress menu to create demo menu
  • Demo website:
    • Connecting wordpress menu to use demo menu
    • Unlimited level menu for demo menu
    • Supporting demo logo with link direction
    • Supporting adding Google Analysis script to increase the page view
    • Connecting page/post (products) when creating menu link, to avoid re-type demo link for each product

Visis us: webfacescript.com

Updating …

Updating …
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire wfs_easy_demo_website folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or Add New Plugin by upload the wfs_easy_demo_website.zip
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘WFS Easy Demo Website’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

short_description: This plugin helps users to easily create a demo site in wordpress blog, based on wordpress menu to create demo menu
